Description: Digital Marketing Company specialising in AI driven Marketing Automation Technology & Services.
Name: RedEye Contour

Methods.Name: Send Service Email Message
Methods.Description: You can send a schedule to an individual recipient or up to a maximum of 10,000 recipients of your choice.

Methods.Name: Send SMS Campaign Schedule
Methods.Description: Send an SMS campaign schedule to recipients using their mobile number.

Methods.Name: Send Email Campaign Schedule
Methods.Description: Send a campaign schedule from Contour to multiple recipients.

Methods.Name: Get RAPID Mailing Status
Methods.Description: Retrieve the status of a RAPID send by providing an appropriate token.

Methods.Name: Create Or Update Person Preferences
Methods.Description: Create new or update existing preferences for a person.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Person Preferences
Methods.Description: Retrieve any of the predefined list of allowed parameters for a person.
